text: Delta of Venus is a 1994 erotic drama movie. It is about an American who gets involved in an affair with another American in pre-World War II Paris. Audie England plays the American novelist Elena. The movie is based on an erotic novel of the same name by Ana√Øs Nin. This movie is rated NC-17 because of explicit sexuality.
